Federal Polytechnic, Nekede bụ ụlọ akwụkwọ dị elu nke gọọmentị etiti nwere nke dị na Nekede, Owerri West mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo na Imo State, South-Eastern Naijiria.
E guzobere ya na saịtị nwa oge na ụlọ akwụkwọ Government Technical College site na gọọmentị Imo State na 1978 dị ka College of Technology, Owerri tupu ebufee ya n'ebe ọ dị ugbu a na Nekede

Na 7 Eprel 1993, a gbanwere polytechnic ka ọ bụrụ ụlọ akwụkwọ gọọmentị etiti ma nye ya aha ọzọ "The Federal Polytechnic, Nekede". Federal Polytechnic, Nekede na-enye National Diploma na Higher National Diploma ọmụmụ na ọkwa ndị gụsịrị akwụkwọ.
Federal Polytechnic, Nekede nwere ngalaba ụlọ akwụkwọ asaa (faculties) nke ọmụmụ;
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Industrial and Applied Science (SIAS), Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Business Management Technology (SBMT),
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Environmental Design and Technology (SEDT),
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Ọrụ Ugbo na Nkà na Ụzụ Ọrụ Ugbo(SAAT), na
Ụlọ akwụkwọ nke Information and Communication Technology (SICT).
N'abalị atọ n'ọnwa Ọktoba n'afọ 2018, Federal Polytechnic Nekede wepụtara Rev
Micheal Arimanwa dị ka Rector nke 8 nke Polytechnic na Alumnus Rector mbụ nke ụlọ ọrụ ahụ.
Micheal Arimanwa bụ onye ụkọchukwu nke bụ nke Ngalaba Injinia Civil, Ọ bụbu ngalaba injinia HOD Civil, Onye bụbu Dean School of Engineering.
